title: Cobalt Bikes takes off with new custom titanium mountain and gravel bikes
content:
Cobalt bikes, (primarily a carbon bike manufacturer) are now offering their Warhawk gravel and Diablo mountain frames with a custom titanium spin. The Cobalt brand started with carbon but now is turning some of its time to custom titanium bikes. The all-new Ti-WarHawk and Ti-Diablo are offered in the same geometry as the carbon versions

The post Cobalt Bikes takes off with new custom titanium mountain and gravel bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
